sourcesContent:
Your Cart is Empty.
  • Total {{ cartTotal | currency:'$' }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; //import { MessengerService } from 'src/app/services/messenger.service' import { Product } from 'src/app/models/product'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.css'] }) export class CartComponent implements OnInit { cartItems = [ { id: 1, proudctId: 1, productName: 'Test 1', qty: 4, price: 100 }, { id: 2, proudctId: 3, productName: 'Test 3', qty: 5, price: 50 }, { id: 3, proudctId: 2, productName: 'Test 2', qty: 3, price: 150 }, { id: 4, proudctId: 4, productName: 'Test 4', qty: 2, price: 200 }, ]; cartTotal = 0 constructor() { } ngOnInit() { this.cartTotal = 0 this.cartItems.forEach(item => { this.cartTotal += (item.qty * item.price) }) } }
